reviews.customers_say: Customers find the pajama set sexy, comfortable, and incredibly soft, with good quality and value for money. They describe it as flattering, with one customer noting it's great for appearing nude. The fit receives positive feedback, though opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality! Fit as expected.
items.body: Soft, comfortable. Cute! Sexy. Great quality! Ran a bit small but it still fit fine - I could have bought a bigger size but it wasn't enough to return. It just didn't close as much in the front. The shirts fit fine and I was expecting those to be a problem. But all great. Looks and fit. I bought black Read more
items.author: psychobabble

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size, super cute
items.body: Ordered these for my wedding anniversary pajama set. True to size, comfortable, and super cute. Quality seems fairly good- no frays or anything of the sort. Read more
items.author: Sarah C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good
items.body: Looks great and fits well Read more
items.author: John

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must Have!
items.body: This is adorable. Bought a medium in black. Fits as described and true to size. I’m 5’4 and about 165. Love it. Will get one more color. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and dainty
items.body: Bought this for a friends wedding gift and it was surprisingly great! I was a bit skeptical that it would be low quality but thankfully that wasn’t the case. It’s so cute and material feels like it would be comfy to wear. Read more
items.author: J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice overall!
items.body: Wife really liked this sexy set. It fit her perfectly and the sheer pink is very sexy. She does not like thongs, so these panty/bottoms were much to her liking. Nice quality for the price . Read more
items.author: G & J W

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars gorgeous, but odd fitting
items.body: This lingerie set is absolutely gorgeous, don't get my 3-star rating wrong. My main issue is that, while the bottoms fit perfectly, the top was NOT made for women with larger chests. If I size up, the shorts will be too big. I wish it fit me better because I am obsessed with it! It's very thin, durable, and overall great quality if you find a size that fits you perfectly. I just wish it were more fitting for women with larger chests! Read more
items.author: Sara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, super cute
items.body: This was a gift for a bacherolette party and the bride-to-be loved it. It seems to be good quality and the sizing seemed right on. The material was soft, seemed comfortable (for short-term wear) and is really cute. Very good quality for the price. Read more
items.author: Deb Combs

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Blue, Rose Red Heart Print, Black, Navy Blue, Mint Green, Red, Red Heart Print, Pink, White, Beige, Purple, Yellow, White Heart Print. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
